main event: Three intense lights were observed together traveling in a trail formation over Miami, Florida, on May 27, 1957.
interesting points: The lights disappeared below the horizon after 2-3 seconds of observation,The color of the lights was unknown,One known jet aircraft in the area,The observation was ground-visual and made by a civilian,Conclusions suggested the lights could be a meteor, balloon, aircraft, or astronomical event.
sighted object: three intense lights in trail formation
